text: Götz Wolfgang Werner (5 February 1944 – 8 February 2022) was a German businessman. He was a popular support for universal basic income. In 2013, his net worth was said to be around €1.1 billion, making him the 109th-richest German.„Die 500 reichsten Deutschen“, Manager Magazin special issue, October 2013, p. 64 Werner died in Stuttgart, Germany on 8 February 2022, three days after his 78th birthday. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German businesspeople Category:People from Heidelberg
title: Götz Werner
